thread.section_title: Ingram's Water & Air Equipment Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ingram's Water & Air Equipment | ingramswaterandair.com
thread.title: Ramiro Parker
thread.title_full: Ingram's Water & Air Equipment reviewed by Ramiro Parker

author: Ramiro Parker
title: Ramiro Parker
text: I bought a Bryant electronic air cleaner, the secondary quit working on the third day. I called Ingram's and told them about the situation. No questions asked they told me to send it back and I did. They gave me a full refund & paid my shipping cost. I was extremely happy and plan to purchase another in the near future. I understand thing's happen and I believe this was an factory defect. Thank You So Much
